programme.title: Don't Let Go
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Drama, Horror, Sci Fi, Thriller, Comedy ║ 2019 ║ 15
programme.desc: Detective Jack Radcliff gets a shocking phone call from his recently murdered niece Ashley. Working together across time, they race to solve her murder before it can happen. Director Jacob Estes's mystery, starring David Oyelowo, Storm Reid and Mykelti Williamson Jacob Aaron Estes - Director David Oyelowo - Detective Jack Radcliff Storm Reid - Ashley Byron Mann - Detective Roger Lee Mykelti Williamson - Bobby Shinelle Azoroh - Susan Alfred Molina - Howard Brian Tyree Henry - Garret Radcliff David Oyelowo - Detective Jack Radcliff Storm Reid - Ashley Byron Mann - Detective Roger Lee Mykelti Williamson - Bobby Shinelle Azoroh - Susan Alfred Molina - Howard Brian Tyree Henry - Garret Radcliff.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: Action adventure starring Dwayne Johnson and Naomie Harris. Primatologist Davis Okoye is faced with a shocking dilemma when his beloved albino gorilla George is exposed to a chemical that turns him into a destructive, raging colossus. As other animal predators are transformed into monsters, it's up to Davis and disgraced scientist Kate Caldwell to find a cure to save George before the world is devastated Brad Peyton - Director Dwayne Johnson - Davis Okoye Naomie Harris - Dr Kate Caldwell Jeffrey Dean Morgan - Agent Russell Malin Akerman - Claire Wyden Jake Lacy - Brett Wyden Joe Manganiello - Burke P J Byrne - Nelson Marley Shelton - Dr Atkins Will Yun Lee - Agent Park Dwayne Johnson - Davis Okoye Naomie Harris - Dr Kate Caldwell Jeffrey Dean Morgan - Agent Russell Malin Akerman - Claire Wyden Jake Lacy - Brett Wyden Joe Manganiello - Burke P J Byrne - Nelson Marley Shelton - Dr Atkins Will Yun Lee - Agent Park.

programme.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
programme.desc: In her turbulent life as a professional assassin, Scarlet was cruelly forced to abandon her daughter Sam and go on the run. Years later, despite the estrangement, Sam has also grown up into a cold-blooded hitwoman. After a high-stakes mission spins out of control, Sam has no choice but to go rogue. This ultimately leads her back to her mother and her former sidekicks, who join forces against those who took everything from them. programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: Classic western starring Alan Ladd, Jean Arthur and Van Heflin. In Wyoming during the 1890s, the bitter feud between homesteaders and rival cattlemen grows stronger. programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Biographical comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". But the seemingly carefree congressman is stirred into action when socialite Joanne Herring draws his attention to the plight of the Afghan people suffering under Soviet occupation. With the help of a renegade CIA agent, he sets out to raise cash for the resistance fighters Mike Nichols - Director Tom Hanks - Charlie Wilson Julia Roberts - Joanne Herring Philip Seymour Hoffman - Gust Avrakotos Amy Adams - Bonnie Bach Emily Blunt - Jane Liddle Ken Stott - Zvi Om Puri - President Zia Ned Beatty - Doc Long Shiri Appleby - Charlie's Angel Tom Hanks - Charlie Wilson Julia Roberts - Joanne Herring Philip Seymour Hoffman - Gust Avrakotos Amy Adams - Bonnie Bach Emily Blunt - Jane Liddle Ken Stott - Zvi Om Puri - President Zia Ned Beatty - Doc Long Shiri Appleby - Charlie's Angel.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: Action crime thriller based on the Marvel comic, starring Tom Jane, John Travolta, Will Patton and Rebecca Romijn-Stamos. Undercover FBI special agent Frank Castle agrees to one final operation before retiring, but it all goes wrong when Florida gangster Howard Saint's son is killed in the process. Swearing revenge for his child, Saint orders the murder of Castle and his entire family. programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Biographical comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". But the seemingly carefree congressman is stirred into action when socialite Joanne Herring draws his attention to the plight of the Afghan people suffering under Soviet occupation. programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killer's enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: Moving On
programme.desc: Comedy drama starring Jane Fonda and Lily Tomlin. At the funeral for an old friend, Claire approaches the deceased's widower and states that she intends to murder him in revenge for something terrible he did decades ago. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins, Helena Bonham Carter and Johnny Flynn. programme.title: The Great Escaper
programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. Bernie needs to make the trip to Normandy for personal reasons, and with Rene's blessing, he sneaks off to pay his respects. programme.title: The Last Rifleman
programme.desc: Artie Crawford is a Second World War veteran who has just lost his wife. programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: In October 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir initially refuses to act on intelligence that suggests Egypt and Syria intend to launch a co-ordinated military offensive against Israel. Eventually the attacks begin, catching Minister of Defence Moshe Dayan off guard. Meir refuses to accept his resignation and a weakened Dayan leads the Israeli response, which requires Meir to request air support from US Secretary of State, Henry Kissinger. Biopic, starring Helen Mirren, Zed Josef and Liev Schreiber Guy Nattiv - Director Helen Mirren - Golda Meir Liev Schreiber - Henry Kissinger Camille Cottin - Lou Kaddar Rami Heuberger - Moshe Dyan Lior Ashkenazi - David \Dado\ Elazar Helen Mirren - Golda Meir Liev Schreiber - Henry Kissinger Camille Cottin - Lou Kaddar Rami Heuberger - Moshe Dyan Lior Ashkenazi - David \Dado\ Elazar.

programme.title: Save the Cinema
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Liz Evans from Carmarthen, south-west Wales, who started a campaign in the 1990s to save the town's Lyric Cinema. With the help of local politician Richard Goodridge, Liz manages to persuade Steven Spielberg to show a premiere of Jurassic Park at the Lyric. programme.title: The Colour Room
programme.desc: Period drama telling the story of Clarice Cliff, who broke the glass ceiling and helped revolutionise the workplace in the 20th century. Clarice is a vivacious young factory worker in the industrial British midlands of the 1920s. Bursting with ideas for colours and shapes, she takes more and more dangerous risks, but manages to stay one step ahead of the workhouse and impress eccentric factory owner Colley Shorter with her talent and innovation. programme.title: The Cinema List: British Sky Originals
